verbs.description: While [ARG1: broadcast networks ABC and CBS] [V: were] [ARG2: skeptical about how the U.S .- North Korea agreement would turn out ( a legitimate concern considering North Korea ’s history of reneging on such deals )] , NBC Nightly News took a noticeably harsher tone and railed against President Trump . This decrying of Trump ’s agreement comes after NBC has gone to bat time and time again for the radical
